title: Oxygen for India — COVID Relief Yoga Classes
author: Will
description: Read about how MyYogaTeacher participated in COVID relief efforts in India during the heigh of the pandemic.
cleaned_text: COVID is rampaging through India, tearing apart families, and leaving hospitals crippled by an overflow of cases. Image from BBC.com - hospitals in Delhi have been forced to display signs saying they have run out of oxygen The supply of oxygen and ventilators is critically low. Too many people are dying simply because they can't get the oxygen they need. You might be looking for a way to help our brothers and sisters in India. Right now, what they need more than anything is Oxygen. For the next few weeks we'll be [offering daily Oxygen Drive yoga classes](https://www.myyogateacher.com/workshops). These classes are $5 per session and we'll donate 100% of the funds to [Give India's Oxygen campaign](https://covid.giveindia.org/healthcare-heroes/). MYT Teachers have volunteered to donate their time. Now all we need is students like you to sign up for these Oxygen Drive classes ( [you can click here to sign up](https://www.myyogateacher.com/workshops)). And if you really want to make an impact, you can forward this email, or share the classes with your friends. We'll roll out more classes to our "Workshop" page daily, as we organize our teachers and get them up on the site. Please [check our Workshop page every day for upcoming "Oxygen Drive" classes](https://www.myyogateacher.com/workshops). You can get your daily yoga fix while helping people who truly need support right now. If you have family or friends in India, all of us at myYogaTeacher are sending love to you and your family. In fact, some of these Oxygen Drive classes will even have group meditations for sending health and love to those who are in critical condition or have lost a loved one. We hope to see you in some of these classes!
